radicchio.name: Radicchio
radicchio.description: It has a bitter and spicy taste that mellows if it is grilled or roasted.
radicchiosalad.name: Radicchio Salad
radicchiosalad.description: This winter salad has a nice combination of flavors.
radicchioseeds.name: Radicchio Seeds
radicchioseeds.description: Plant these in winter. Takes 9 days to mature.
juniperberry.name: Juniper Berry
juniperberry.description: A small, aromatic fruit with a sharp, piney flavor, commonly used as a spice in cooking and as a key botanical in gin production.
junipergin.name: Juniper Gin
junipergin.description: This gin is characterized by its distinctive flavor, derived primarily from juniper berries, which impart a piney and herbal taste to the spirit.
juniperberryseeds.name: Juniper Berry Seeds
juniperberryseeds.description: Plant these in winter. Takes 13 days to mature, and continues to produce after first harvest.
turnip.name: Turnip
turnip.description: A hardy root vegetable related to the radish, with a slightly peppery flavor and packed with vitamins and minerals.
turnipseeds.name: Turnip Seeds
turnipseeds.description: Plant these in winter. Takes 4 days to mature.
